attributes.action: BAN THE WEARING OF THE NIQAB IN ENGLISH SCHOOLS
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to ban the wearing of the Niqab or any other face covering in English schools, we should encourage free thought and discourage religious clothing of any sort or else what did Emily Pankhurst give her life for?

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: Ban the niqab

Created by: Tim W

Closing 25/02/2015
